message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at an excellent value.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, $140 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $130.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering your offer, I am able to agree on a price of $135 for the product. This still allows me to maintain a good profit margin while offering you a competitive price.
